name: Cave-in
description:
Escape your dreadful fate!

You are trapped in a cave. You must face difficult obstacle and find your way out.

How-to-Play:

LEFT & RIGHT ARROW KEYS : to move left and right.

SPACE : to jump.

HOLD LCTRL & UP & DOWN ARROW KEYS : to climb.

HOLD LSHFT & UP & DOWN ARROW KEYS : to move the flashlight up & down.

E : to interact.

R : to respawn to checkpoint and refresh platforms.

This my very first game that I completed and first game jam. I'm still a beginner and I'm looking forward for your feedback. Enjoy.
